name: sys::pal::unix::cvt_r

sys::pal::unix::cvt.doc:
Converts native return values to Result using the *-1 means error is in `errno`*  convention.
 Non-error values are `Ok`-wrapped.

core::result::Result: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 20, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 4564, name: "io::error::Error" }), GenericArgs([]))) })])

doc: `-1` → look at `errno` → retry on `EINTR`. Otherwise `Ok()`-wrap the closure return value.
